sentences.en: "Enter-taining is something that everyone in the country can enjoy," she averred.
sentences.cn: “娱乐消遣是每个国民都能享受的事，”她坚定地说。

sentences.en: Be a little easier on yourself and enjoy yourself more.
sentences.cn: 对自己别太苛刻，让自己更快乐些。

sentences.en: Boys and girls will enjoy messing about with any kind of machine.
sentences.cn: 男孩和女孩会喜欢摆弄各种机械装置。

sentences.en: He is a veteran parliamentarian whose views enjoy widespread respect.
sentences.cn: 他是个资深议员，其观点受到广泛尊重。

sentences.en: I also enjoy windsurfing, tennis, racquetball, swimming, you name it.
sentences.cn: 我也喜欢帆板、网球、短柄墙球、游泳等等，不一而足。

sentences.en: I enjoy pleasure as much as the next person.
I enjoy the omnibus edition of Eastenders on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢看《伦敦东区》的周日连播版。

sentences.en: I enjoyed every minute of it.
I have been a shooter for 16 years and enjoy my sport.
sentences.cn: 我从事射击运动已经16年了，很喜爱这项运动。

sentences.en: I like the taste of wine and enjoy trying different kinds.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢葡萄酒的味道，喜欢品尝不同的口味。

sentences.en: I myself enjoy cinema, poetry, eating out and long walks.
sentences.cn: 我本人喜欢电影、诗歌、外出吃饭和远途散步。

sentences.en: Many enjoy the mental stimulation of a challenging job.
sentences.cn: 很多人喜欢富有挑战性的工作所带来的强烈的精神刺激。

sentences.en: Sandra enjoys her job in the city.
sentences.cn: 桑德拉很喜欢她在城里的这份工作。

sentences.en: Take a well-earned rest and go out and enjoy yourself.
sentences.cn: 你理应休息一下，出去好好玩玩。

sentences.en: Thanks for a great evening. I really enjoyed it.
sentences.cn: 感谢你这美好的晚会。我真的玩得很开心。

sentences.en: The average German will enjoy 40 days' paid holiday this year.
sentences.cn: 今年，德国人将平均享受40天的带薪假期。

sentences.en: There were two lemon trees and I paused to enjoy their perfume.
sentences.cn: 那里有两棵柠檬树，我不禁驻足品味柠檬的芬芳。

sentences.en: They enjoy themselves drinking wine, smoking and playing cards.
sentences.cn: 他们又是喝酒抽烟，又是打牌，玩得很痛快。

sentences.en: We thoroughly enjoyed our time in New York.
sentences.cn: 我们在纽约的时间过得十分快活。

words.tran_cn: 愉快地；有趣地；可享乐地

trans.tran_cn: 享受，欣赏，感到愉快，享有
